mapper.select: SELECT t.acount acount, t.characterr characterr, t.conversionfactor conversionfactor, t.directorytype directorytype, t.dosage dosage, t.drugefficacy drugefficacy, t.drugimg drugimg, t.functionRug functionRug, t.id id, t.menterprise menterprise, t.namee namee, t.packingunit packingunit, t.pprice pprice, t.prprice prprice, t.repertory repertory , t.scdate scdate, t.serialNumber serialNumber, t.sftenterprise sftenterprise, t.specification specification, t.yxdate yxdate FROM t_web_drug t where t.id=#{spid}

SELECT t.acount acount, t.characterr characterr, t.conversionfactor conversionfactor, t.directorytype directorytype, t.dosage dosage, t.drugefficacy drugefficacy, t.drugimg drugimg, t.functionRug functionRug, t.id id, t.menterprise menterprise, t.namee namee, t.packingunit packingunit, t.pprice pprice, t.prprice prprice, t.repertory repertory , t.scdate scdate, t.serialNumber serialNumber, t.sftenterprise sftenterprise, t.specification specification, t.yxdate yxdate FROM t_web_drug t ORDER BY t.scdate desc LIMIT 13
select t.id ids,t.pid pid,t.text texts,t.url url from t_web_tree t where t.pid=#{pid}

select acount acount, status status, brand brand, drupstatus drupstatus, characterr characterr, conversionfactor conversionfactor, directorytype directorytype, dosage dosage, drugefficacy drugefficacy, drugimg drugimg, functionRug functionRug, id id, menterprise menterprise, namee namee, packingunit packingunit, pprice pprice, prprice prprice, repertory repertory , scdate scdate, serialNumber serialNumber, sftenterprise sftenterprise, specification specification, yxdate yxdate from t_web_drug
